A version of '''[[Minecraft Indev]]''' was released on '''February 7, 2010''', at 17:03 UTC.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Water JE6.png|32px]] [[Water]]'''
* Now generates splash particles around the edges when it's next to air.
* Modifications to water splashes.

=== General ===
'''[[Sound]]s'''
* Changes to liquid sounds.<ref>[https://gist.github.com/Pokechu22/2384e359abd0fb976477aec578ed5370 Indev 20100207-1 vs. Indev 20100207-2 difference comparison] by [https://github.com/Pokechu22 Pokechu22] on GitHub.</ref>

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* [[Slab]]s and [[Farmland]] causes lighting issues.
